titleStmt.title: An exposition of the Lords prayer. Delivered in two and twenty lectures, at the church of Lieth in Scotland; by Mr William Wischart parson of Restalrigg
titleStmt.author: Wishart, William, parson of Restalrigg.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M. Flesher, for Nicolas Bourne at the south entrance of the Royall Exchange,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: Lectures upon the Lords prayer.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
Lacks pages 83-86. Pages 70-103 from the Library of Congress copy spliced at end.

place.placeName: the south entrance of the Royall Exchange
